eu.stratosphere.nephele.io

Class BroadcastRecordWriter<T extends Record>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.io.AbstractRecordWriter<T>
      • eu.stratosphere.nephele.io.BroadcastRecordWriter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the record that can be emitted with this record writer
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writer<T>

    public class BroadcastRecordWriter<T extends Record>
extends AbstractRecordWriter<T>
    A record writer connects the application to an output gate. It allows the application of emit (send out) to the output gate. The broadcast record writer will make sure that each emitted record will be transfered via all connected output channels.
    Author:
    warneke

      BroadcastRecordWriter(AbstractInputTask<?> inputBase)
